HotelSystem

Interface HotelManagementSystem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Guest, Receptionist

    public interface HotelManagementSystem

    • Method Detail

      • bookingRoom

        void bookingRoom(Room newRoom,
                 Hotel hotelOb,
                 java.lang.String filename)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        newRoom - Room class's object that is gonna use for book a room and hold it room's information.
        hotelOb - Hotel class's object that holds number of rooms and full rooms.
        filename - file name for reading and writing data to csv file for hold data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - exception that readData or writeData methods throws

      • canselBooking

        int canselBooking(Room deleteRoom,
                  Hotel hotelOb,
                  int roomId,
                  java.lang.String filename)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        deleteRoom - Room class's object that holds canseling room's and its guest's information
        hotelOb - Hotel class's object for calling readData method to updating database
        roomId - id for cansel operations : check the right room or not
        filename - filename for reading database with name of file from the file
        Returns:
        return value is 1 for right situation, otherwise it is -1 for checking process
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - exception that readData or writeData methods throws

      • writeData

        void writeData(java.lang.String filename)
        Parameters:
        filename - filename for update database on the file

      • readData

        void readData(Hotel hotelOb,
              java.lang.String filename)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        hotelOb - Hotel class's object that sets hotel's number of room's and full room's
        filename - filename for reading database with name of file from the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - exception that readData or writeData methods throws
